languages.text: Сестра удалилась, последовать за ней невозможно. Остается дожидаться ее возвращения.

traits.locale_text: Сестра удалилась, последовать за ней невозможно. Остается дожидаться ее возвращения.

languages.text: Sister Argenta is gone, and there is no way to follow her. All the Lord Captain can do is wait for her to return.
languages.original_text: Сестра удалилась, последовать за ней невозможно. Остается дожидаться ее возвращения.

traits.locale_text: Sister Argenta is gone, and there is no way to follow her. All the Lord Captain can do is wait for her to return.
Sister Argenta is gone, and there is no way to follow her. All the Lord Captain can do is wait for her to return.
Sister Argenta is gone, and there is no way to follow her. All the Lord Captain can do is wait for her to return.
Sister Argenta is gone, and there is no way to follow her. All the Lord Captain can do is wait for her to return.

languages.text: Sœur Argenta est partie sans qu'il soit possible de la suivre. {mf|Le seigneur-capitaine|La seigneure-capitaine} ne peut qu'attendre son retour.
languages.original_text: Sister Argenta is gone, and there is no way to follow her. All the Lord Captain can do is wait for her to return.

traits.locale_text: Sœur Argenta est partie sans qu'il soit possible de la suivre. {mf|Le seigneur-capitaine|La seigneure-capitaine} ne peut qu'attendre son retour.

languages.text: 阿洁塔已经离开了，没有办法得知她的行踪。行商浪人唯一能做的事情，就是静静地等待她回来。
languages.original_text: Sister Argenta is gone, and there is no way to follow her. All the Lord Captain can do is wait for her to return.

traits.locale_text: 阿洁塔已经离开了，没有办法得知她的行踪。行商浪人唯一能做的事情，就是静静地等待她回来。

languages.text: シスター・アルジェンタは姿を消した。彼女を追いかける手段は残されていない。ロード・キャプテンにできることは、ただ彼女の帰りを待つことである。
languages.original_text: Sister Argenta is gone, and there is no way to follow her. All the Lord Captain can do is wait for her to return.

traits.locale_text: シスター・アルジェンタは姿を消した。彼女を追いかける手段は残されていない。ロード・キャプテンにできることは、ただ彼女の帰りを待つことである。

languages.text: Schwester Argenta ist fort und der Lord Captain kann ihr nicht folgen. Es bleibt nichts anderes, als auf ihre Rückkehr zu warten.
languages.original_text: Sister Argenta is gone, and there is no way to follow her. All the Lord Captain can do is wait for her to return.

traits.locale_text: Schwester Argenta ist fort und der Lord Captain kann ihr nicht folgen. Es bleibt nichts anderes, als auf ihre Rückkehr zu warten.

languages.text: La Hermana Argenta se ha ido y no hay forma de seguirla. {mf|El|La} Lord Capitán solo puede esperar a que vuelva.
languages.original_text: Sister Argenta is gone, and there is no way to follow her. All the Lord Captain can do is wait for her to return.

traits.locale_text: La Hermana Argenta se ha ido y no hay forma de seguirla. {mf|El|La} Lord Capitán solo puede esperar a que vuelva.

languages.text: Rahibe Argenta gitti ve onu takip etmek mümkün değil. Lord Kaptan'ın tek yapabileceği, onun dönüşünü beklemek.
languages.original_text: Sister Argenta is gone, and there is no way to follow her. All the Lord Captain can do is wait for her to return.
